p: Since 1984, the primary care Sentinelles surveillance network has monitored influenza epidemics in France. Its seniority, the stability of the methods and ILI definition used allowed the comparison of 32 seasonal influenza epidemics and a pandemic, observed between winters 1984/85 and 2016/17. We highlighted a decrease in epidemic size and height over time. We bring out associations between epidemics characteristics and circulating dominant or co‚Äêdominant viruses: epidemic size, peak height and age of cases.
